title: Stay Cool and Covered With Summer’s Best Beach Hats
description: These will look so good with that new swimsuit.
excerpt: Discover the best beach hats to stay stylish and sun-safe all season—perfect for travel, UV protection, and effortless summer looks.
text: The Editors' PickJanessa Leone Felix Bucket HatLos Angeles-based label Janessa Leone is a firm favorite of editors, including ELLE’s senior fashion commerce editor, Dale Arden Chong. Think minimalist-leaning, made-to-last headwear in sustainable materials. I’ve personally taken my Greta straw hat everywhere—from Spain and Italy to Mexico—over the years, and it’s never let me down when it comes to sightseeing or sunbathing on the beach. Sizes: S-LColors: Black, Dark Earth, TanMaterials: 100% strawBest Straw Cowboy HatLack of Color Phoenix CowboyThere’s something undeniably cool about wearing a straw cowboy hat to the beach. This delicious chocolate brown option from Australian label Lack of Color is made to be styled with a turquoise bikini, gold body chain, vintage sunglasses, and a carefree attitude.Sizes: S-XLColors: CarobMaterials: 100% paperCustomer review: “I couldn’t love this hat any more! The perfect shape and shade for summer (and beyond). Love how lightweight it is —consider it my new favorite hat!”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowGet CreativeRalph Lauren Cotton Chino Bucket HatThe perfect bucket hat does exist—thanks to Ralph Lauren’s option to customize your own. Personalize the brand’s classic twill silhouette as you please by adding the Polo icon in your color of choice and a monogram or logo. Sizes: S/M-L/XLColors: White, Black, NavyMaterials: 100% cottonThis Two-tone OneMadewell Lantern Straw HatThe bestselling Lantern style from Madewell is an under-$100 fan favorite for a reason. The flippable brim on this roomy bucket hat lets you wear it slightly off your face while still offering enough coverage to shield you from the sun on a hot day at the beach or park.Sizes: S/M-M/LColors: 6 optionsMaterials: 100% raffiaCustomer review: “I’ve never really been a hat wearer, but just as I was about to wrap up my shopping, this one caught my eye. I tried it on and instantly fell in love. It’s the perfect size and shape and the perfect little accessory to complete a look!”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest Packable Wide BrimFree People Arizona HatWhether you have an adventure on the agenda or just want to kick back in the sun, this easy-to-pack wide-brim hat is a reliable companion for destination beach trips. It folds like a dream while keeping its shape. The adjustable leather tie is a chic addition—and comes in handy when the wind hits the shore.Sizes: One sizeColors: White, Mixed Coffee, Toast, Mixed GreenMaterials: 100% paper strawCustomer review: “I’m taking a road trip to the southwest and really needed a hat that was good quality, would cover my face and neck, and that I could tighten in case it gets windy! This hat is all of those things and super cute.”Divine In DenimMiu Miu Denim Bucket HatWith light distressing at the edges, this bucket hat is both casual and cool. Hide underneath it for a day of reading and watching the waves. Then, style it with a colorful sarong and beaded accessories when you hit the beach bar come sundown.Sizes: S-XLColors: Navy, Black, White Materials: 100% cottonAdvertisement - Continue Reading BelowLuxe LinenJenni Kayne Linen Bucket HatThere’s a reason lightweight linen is a go-to fabric for scorching-hot weather. Made in Portugal and true to Jenni Kayne’s ethos of relaxed and refined staples, this simple accessory is one you’ll turn to time and time again. Sizes: S/M-M/LColors: Natural Materials: 100% linenCustomer review: “Beautiful fabric, has nice body/weight to it. Looks like it will hold up nicely.”Perfect For PackingCuyana Wide Brim Ecuador HatMeet your new travel companion. Cuyana’s handwoven hat is as portable as it is stylish, thanks to its ribbon detailing. It travels easily and holds its shape—ideal for those times when you have multiple destinations on the agenda (Greek island-hopping, anyone?). As someone prone to burning, I appreciate the guaranteed coverage from its particularly wide brim.Sizes: 56-59Colors: Cocoa, Natural, Dark Natural Materials: 100% Toquilla strawCustomer review: “Beautiful fabric, has nice body/weight to it. Looks like it will hold up nicely.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowSimple And Stylish Hat Attack Hat Attack Packable Sunhat in Neutral.With 40 years of experience, Hat Attack consistently delivers trusty accessories. Its sustainably minded, made-in-the-USA hats hold their shape for years, and there’s no shortage of classic colorways and styles to elevate your vacation ’fits. Take this fully lined, frayed-edge number, for example—it will enhance even the simplest of swimsuits.Sizes: One sizeColors: Solid Natural, Solid WhiteMaterials: 55% linen, 45% cottonStay Sun SafeSolbari Bondi Bucket Hat With plenty of colorways available, there’s sure to be a Bondi Bucket Hat for you. Rendered in Solbari’s signature UPF 50+ Technical Performance fabric, this comfortable, breathable hat also comes dermatologist recommended.Sizes: S/M-M/LColors: 10 optionsMaterials: 100% nylonCustomer review: “Perfect lightweight hat and coverage for Florida sun. The cinch allows a tight fit for windy days and stays in place. Quality and style are best I’ve found for price. Highly recommend.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowFor Added Sun ProtectionNikki Beach Barbados Hat This wide-brimmed straw hat from Nikki Beach aces it in the boho beach glamour category—it also boasts UPF 50+ protection. I love the conversation-starting shell detailing, which turns any seaside look into a moment. Sizes: S/M-M/LColors: WhiteMaterials: 100% nylonA Crochet Coveruplululemon Cotton Crochet Bucket HatWith handcrafted crochet and a minimal logo, there’s something irresistible about this nostalgic style from Lululemon. I’d wear the ivory or striped option with a sporty, sleek bikini—and a puka shell necklace for good measure.Sizes: S/M-M/LColors: Light Ivory, Club Blue/Ivory, Black/Ivory, Raceway Green/IvoryMaterials: 57% cotton, 43% polyesterAdvertisement - Continue Reading BelowWhy Trust ElleEvery product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. html:
The Editors' Pick

Janessa Leone Felix Bucket Hat

Los Angeles-based label Janessa Leone is a firm favorite of editors, including ELLE’s senior fashion commerce editor, Dale Arden Chong. Think minimalist-leaning, made-to-last headwear in sustainable materials. I’ve personally taken my Greta straw hat everywhere—from Spain and Italy to Mexico—over the years, and it’s never let me down when it comes to sightseeing or sunbathing on the beach.

Sizes: S-L

Colors: Black, Dark Earth, Tan

Materials: 100% straw

Best Straw Cowboy Hat

Lack of Color Phoenix Cowboy

There’s something undeniably cool about wearing a straw cowboy hat to the beach. This delicious chocolate brown option from Australian label Lack of Color is made to be styled with a turquoise bikini, gold body chain, vintage sunglasses, and a carefree attitude.

Sizes: S-XL

Colors: Carob

Materials: 100% paper

Customer review: “I couldn’t love this hat any more! The perfect shape and shade for summer (and beyond). Love how lightweight it is —consider it my new favorite hat!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Get Creative

Ralph Lauren Cotton Chino Bucket Hat

The perfect bucket hat does exist—thanks to Ralph Lauren’s option to customize your own. Personalize the brand’s classic twill silhouette as you please by adding the Polo icon in your color of choice and a monogram or logo.

Sizes: S/M-L/XL

Colors: White, Black, Navy

Materials: 100% cotton

This Two-tone One

Madewell Lantern Straw Hat

The bestselling Lantern style from Madewell is an under-$100 fan favorite for a reason. The flippable brim on this roomy bucket hat lets you wear it slightly off your face while still offering enough coverage to shield you from the sun on a hot day at the beach or park.

Sizes: S/M-M/L

Colors: 6 options

Materials: 100% raffia

Customer review: “I’ve never really been a hat wearer, but just as I was about to wrap up my shopping, this one caught my eye. I tried it on and instantly fell in love. It’s the perfect size and shape and the perfect little accessory to complete a look!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Packable Wide Brim

Free People Arizona Hat

Whether you have an adventure on the agenda or just want to kick back in the sun, this easy-to-pack wide-brim hat is a reliable companion for destination beach trips. It folds like a dream while keeping its shape. The adjustable leather tie is a chic addition—and comes in handy when the wind hits the shore.

Sizes: One size

Colors: White, Mixed Coffee, Toast, Mixed Green

Materials: 100% paper straw

Customer review: “I’m taking a road trip to the southwest and really needed a hat that was good quality, would cover my face and neck, and that I could tighten in case it gets windy! This hat is all of those things and super cute.”

Divine In Denim

Miu Miu Denim Bucket Hat

With light distressing at the edges, this bucket hat is both casual and cool. Hide underneath it for a day of reading and watching the waves. Then, style it with a colorful sarong and beaded accessories when you hit the beach bar come sundown.

Sizes: S-XL

Colors: Navy, Black, White

Materials: 100% cotton

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Luxe Linen

Jenni Kayne Linen Bucket Hat

There’s a reason lightweight linen is a go-to fabric for scorching-hot weather. Made in Portugal and true to Jenni Kayne’s ethos of relaxed and refined staples, this simple accessory is one you’ll turn to time and time again.

Sizes: S/M-M/L

Colors: Natural

Materials: 100% linen

Customer review: “Beautiful fabric, has nice body/weight to it. Looks like it will hold up nicely.”

Perfect For Packing

Cuyana Wide Brim Ecuador Hat

Meet your new travel companion. Cuyana’s handwoven hat is as portable as it is stylish, thanks to its ribbon detailing. It travels easily and holds its shape—ideal for those times when you have multiple destinations on the agenda (Greek island-hopping, anyone?). As someone prone to burning, I appreciate the guaranteed coverage from its particularly wide brim.

Sizes: 56-59

Colors: Cocoa, Natural, Dark Natural

Materials: 100% Toquilla straw

Customer review: “Beautiful fabric, has nice body/weight to it. Looks like it will hold up nicely.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Simple And Stylish

Hat Attack Hat Attack Packable Sunhat in Neutral.

With 40 years of experience, Hat Attack consistently delivers trusty accessories. Its sustainably minded, made-in-the-USA hats hold their shape for years, and there’s no shortage of classic colorways and styles to elevate your vacation ’fits. Take this fully lined, frayed-edge number, for example—it will enhance even the simplest of swimsuits.

Sizes: One size

Colors: Solid Natural, Solid White

Materials: 55% linen, 45% cotton

Stay Sun Safe

Solbari Bondi Bucket Hat

With plenty of colorways available, there’s sure to be a Bondi Bucket Hat for you. Rendered in Solbari’s signature UPF 50+ Technical Performance fabric, this comfortable, breathable hat also comes dermatologist recommended.

Sizes: S/M-M/L

Colors: 10 options

Materials: 100% nylon

Customer review: “Perfect lightweight hat and coverage for Florida sun. The cinch allows a tight fit for windy days and stays in place. Quality and style are best I’ve found for price. Highly recommend.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

For Added Sun Protection

Nikki Beach Barbados Hat

This wide-brimmed straw hat from Nikki Beach aces it in the boho beach glamour category—it also boasts UPF 50+ protection. I love the conversation-starting shell detailing, which turns any seaside look into a moment.

Sizes: S/M-M/L

Colors: White

Materials: 100% nylon

A Crochet Coverup

lululemon Cotton Crochet Bucket Hat

With handcrafted crochet and a minimal logo, there’s something irresistible about this nostalgic style from Lululemon. I’d wear the ivory or striped option with a sporty, sleek bikini—and a puka shell necklace for good measure.

Sizes: S/M-M/L

Colors: Light Ivory, Club Blue/Ivory, Black/Ivory, Raceway Green/Ivory

Materials: 57% cotton, 43% polyester

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Why Trust Elle

Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
